sn22.88:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.88:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā assaji kassapakārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.88:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā assaji upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.88:1.4: “etha tumhe, āvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamatha; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.88:1.8: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.88:1.9: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato assajissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.88:1.11: sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.88:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā assaji tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.88:2.2: Addasā kho āyasmā assaji bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn22.88:2.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.7: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.8: “kacci te, assaji, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ …pe… paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn22.88:3.1: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ …pe… abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti.
sn22.88:3.2: “Kacci te, assaji, na kiñci kukkuccaṁ na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:3.3: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṁ kukkuccaṁ anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn22.88:3.4: “Kacci pana taṁ, assaji, attā sīlato na upavadatī”ti?
sn22.88:3.5: “Na kho maṁ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn22.88:3.6: “No ce kira taṁ, assaji, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṁ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:3.7: “Pubbe khvāhaṁ, bhante, gelaññe passambhetvā passambhetvā kāyasaṅkhāre viharāmi, sohaṁ samādhiṁ nappaṭilabhāmi.
sn22.88:3.8: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhato evaṁ hoti:
sn22.88:3.10: “Ye te, assaji, samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā tesaṁ taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhataṁ evaṁ hoti:
sn22.88:4.8: So sukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anajjhositā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.9: Dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anajjhositā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.10: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti …pe… ‘anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.11: So sukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati;
sn22.88:4.12: dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati;
sn22.88:4.13: adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati.
sn22.88:4.14: So kāyapariyantikañce vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti. Jīvitapariyantikañce vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.15: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.1: Seyyathāpi, assaji, telañca paṭicca, vaṭṭiñca paṭicca, telappadīpo jhāyeyya;
sn22.88:5.2: tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
sn22.88:5.3: Evameva kho, assaji, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti. Jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.4: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānātī”ti.
